trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Palmdale
There were no other sightings in Palmdale on or around April 19th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving northbound and saw the 2 objects hovering in the sky. 1 on top of another, i first thought it was a star. Or the planet venus. I ruled that out, i rules it out as conventional aircraft because it had no aviation lights. Inlive by an airport and it was neither flying away nor coming to me as i was by the airport. I filmed this event traveling north at 60mph and posted the video on youtube.
Summary: Ufo even in palmdale near base
